column5: Its the right size for a short stay with privacy. Three doors give you your own entrance so not to disturb the house. Backyard, kitchen, living room and washer/dryer access.  Close to the Domain, public transit (bus), and a bicycle is available for you to use, if you wish.   A cat and dog will be happy to see you and any of your four-legged companions.  Please read our house manual and house rules before you arrive. :)
